infos.value: Worry not. I shall handle these ruffians in short order.
I do so miss our castle.
I know. It's for the good of the kingdom.
If only I'd been born a man, then I could rush headlong into battle with you.
Then I shall ask but one question.
You dare stand in the way of Lady Mach√©rie's carriage?
I do not answer to you.
I see... Then there's but one explanation.
You lot are from Leonis, are you not?
In that case... May the Leonisians bear your enmity!
